name: Bean Room
description:
You have been sentenced to purgatory.

But it's your lucky day because purgatory is going through renovations!

So you have been placed in the Bean Room.

The room alters every time you collect a bean.

You must collect all of the beans to earn you're way into the good place.

Game, Art and SFX Made By: UrBoiRAD

Music (Assets) Made By: Abstraction
